text:
Hans Folke "Hasse" Alfredson (28 June 1931 – 10 September 2017) was a Swedish actor, movie director, writer and comedian. He was born in Malmö, Sweden. He is known for his works with Tage Danielsson as the duo Hasse & Tage.
Alfredson's 1985 movie "False as Water" won the award for Best Director at the 21st Guldbagge Awards.
